channel.title: 639, 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command
channel.description:
im running windows 7 and i keep getting this in the CMD
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: 639, 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Use any of the resources at your disposal and you will find an answer.

You haven’t set your PATH variable (look in the Tutorials Section) to include the JDK/JRE

Read full topic
item.source: 639, 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command
